kpi.name: M1010C213

kpi_info.title: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO CELL ADDITION FOR NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system HHO measurements cancelled due to Active Set Update caused by Cell Addition for UEs with only NRT connection. UPDATED: When a soft handover branch addition triggers the cancellation of inter-system HHO measurement.

kpi.kpi_alias: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO CELL ADDITION FOR NRT
